 OVERVIEW OF GPBANK
 On January 17, 2025, GPBank was converted into a single-member limited liability Commercial Bank with 100% capital owned by VPBank. From October 8, 2025, GPBank officially launches a new brand identity, marking a comprehensive transformation with the new name Generation of Prosperity Bank - symbolizing the journey towards an era of prosperity and sustainable development.
 At the same time, GPBank is the pioneer bank in Vietnam to implement a completely new Core Banking system, built on China’s modern OneConnect Core platform. This strategic move reflects the bank’s ambition to become a technology-driven digital banking leader, not only rebuilding its entire system from scratch but also laying the foundation to replicate and transfer this model to other member units within the VPBank ecosystem.
 Department / Division: Data Solutions and Analytics Department - Information Technology Division
 Reports To: Department Manager
 JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
 Enterprise Data Governance Framework: Develop and implement data governance policies, standards, and roles (Data Owner, Data Steward).
 Data Catalog & Glossary Management: Maintain and update enterprise data catalog and data glossary to ensure consistency and clarity.
 Data Quality Management: Define and monitor data quality metrics (completeness, accuracy, consistency, timeliness) and drive improvements.
 Business Data Support: Support business units in validating and managing input data to ensure accuracy and completeness.
 Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work with IT, BI, and analytics teams to maintain data integrity and consistency across systems.
 Data Governance Tools Implementation: Deploy and oversee tools for data governance, quality, and metadata management.
 Data Projects Participation: Contribute to data integration, warehouse, and analytics projects, ensuring metadata and data quality compliance.
 Yêu cầu công việc
 JOB REQUIREMENTS
 I. Educational Qualifications
 Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems, Information Technology, Computer Science, Data Science, or an equivalent field.
 II. Relevant Knowledge / Expertise
 At least 5 - 7 years of experience in data management, data control, or business data analysis.
 Strong understanding of:
 + Data management concepts (Data Governance, Master Data, Metadata, Data Quality)
 + Banking business processes (preferred)
 + Relational and analytical data models (OLTP/OLAP)
 Skilled in analysis, documentation, and communication with both technical and business teams.
 Proficient in Excel and SQL; experience with Power BI, Tableau, Collibra, Talend, etc. is a plus.
 III. Skills
 Strong system thinking and logical reasoning.
 Clear communication and presentation skills with both technical and non-technical audiences.
 High sense of responsibility, attention to detail, and focus on quality.
 Ability to work independently or as part of a team.
 IV. Required Competencies
 • Experience participating in projects on Data Governance, Data Quality, or Data Catalog.
 • Experience in information system architecture.
 Tại sao bạn sẽ yêu thích làm việc tại đây
 ATTACTIVE BENEFITS & COMPENSATION PACKAGEA
 I. Career Opportunities & Projects
 Participate in implementing data and system integration between cloud platforms and Vietnam’s largest Core Banking Transformation Systems.
 Work in a modern, technology-driven environment leveraging Cloud-native, DevOps, Microservices, and CI/CD practices.
 Learn directly from international technology experts and participate in strategic digital banking initiatives.
 Enjoy a clear career development roadmap with opportunities to advance to Leader or Expert roles in the Digital Banking domain.
 II. Compensation & Benefits
 Competitive salary package: 40-48M Gross (Senior), 55-65M (Expert) x 14–15 months/year.
 Performance-based bonuses: business results, individual performance, innovation, responsibility, etc.
 ESOP program: opportunity to own bank shares.
 Health insurance & wellness: GPBankCare package (provided by Bao Viet Insurance, include Inpatient and Outpatient Healthcare Insurance) extended to employees and family members.
 Learning & Development: support for professional training courses and international certification exams.
 Annual company trip and vacation allowance: up to 6M/year.
 Holiday & special occasion bonuses (National holidays: Sept 2nd, Apr 30th, Hung Kings’ Festival, birthdays, weddings, etc.): up to 3M/time.
 WORKING HOURS AND LOCATION
 I. Working Hours
 Standard working hours: Monday – Friday (flexible start time: 8:00 / 8:30 / 9:00) and 2 Saturday mornings per month (8:00–12:00).
 II. Work Locations
 - Location 01: 89 Lang Ha, Dong Da, Hanoi (VPBank Headquarters)
 - Location 02: 19 Ba Trieu, Hoan Kiem, Hanoi (GPBank Headquarters)
 - Location 03: 45 Nguyen Van Huyen/88 Tran Thai Tong, Cau Giay, Ha Noi (New GPBank Technology Headquarters).', '2026-01-20', '2026-01-23', true, 'SENIOR', 5, 70000000, 'Data Governance Expert', 'FULLTIME', true, 4, 6 );
